name: Russell Tayler
text: Dealing with Clark has been a great experience his knowledge in the welding supply business has been a truly eye opening experience. I went in there almost with an arrogant attitude thinking that i knew what I wanted. But after listening to me patiently and asking questions, and finding out what I really needed he put me on to the right product. Thanks Clark I cant believe that I have not been using this for my welding applications.

name: Taylor holley
text: Went there an waited at the counter a lady just looked at me but wouldn't help... Horrible service

resp.text: We are sorry that our Customer Service Rep was tied up and unable to speak with you when you came in. Please give us another chance to show you our normally outstanding customer service.

name: Bruce Jones
text: Very good prices with excellent customer service

name: ROY TAYLOR
text: Great place

name: Jason Grant
text: they have anything you need

name: Lacy Farms
text: This is a very nice Welding Supply house. They have the best showroom.

name: Jennifer uabmc
text: Nobody inside the building wearing masks, or bothered to put one on when I walked in today. Gross that they can’t even pretend to care about customer health and safety for 1 minute. A group of guys just standing in a circle behind the counter chatting away.

resp.text: We appreciate your taking time to review our company. Customer safety is and remains a priority.  This morning, we included your comment in our morning safety meeting.  Should you wish to talk more about this or have concerns in the future, please contact Kevin, the local branch manager, at (205) 841-0713

name: Benjamin Keith
text: Great place to meet All of your welding and relavent gas needs. They're so good at what they do, even their competitors secretly buy supplies from them. Hands-down the Best in the Business!

name: Joshua Parris
text: Quick service, super friendly and very knowledgeable staff. I'd definitely recommend them over the other welding supply stores in town.

name: leo harrell
text: They are very good at helping you find what you need if they don't sale it they would point you in the right direction

name: Matt Shabani
text: The best in the game!  Airgas who???? Nexair who??? Never heard of them!

name: Derrick Winfrey
text: Will drive past a airgas every time to come here, fast, friendly, and much better selection for real craftsmen that want the best

name: Deane Salyers
text: They have everything you need for your job needs.

name: William Sterling
text: They will NOT answer the phone after 4pm even though They close at 4:30 And this time I had just left there My call was ignored three times!!! It makes sense now because the phone was ringing when I was there. You always have to get the other salesperson to help you out because the one you're dealing with has already closed as register for the day even though it's nowhere close to closing time. If you can't handle a 7 hour shift go home and let someone else have your job that wants it!!

name: Mark Jarrell
text: Knowledgeable sales staff, good stock/variety and competitive pricing. Will be back for any welding consumables or supplies I need in the future

name: Mike Macon
text: A quick stop and go with great courtesy and professional treatment.

name: Cecil Warren
text: It was a pleasant atmosphere good service the guys were great the price was great

name: Lorin Sumpter
text: The welding supplies you need are waiting patiently with a good staff to assist.

name: George Glass
text: Great people that work their

name: David Welch
text: Great Staff , great prices , always willing to help you , no matter what you are doing !

name: David Kilburn
text: They gave me a great deal on a long handle Smith torch. Very much appreciated

name: James Freeman
text: The best ever

name: Tony Studdard
text: Great customer service. Friendly and personal.

name: Theresa Perdue
text:
The staff is very friendly and prices are great.
I went to exchange some tanks we had bought my husband as I was walking into business they were actually on the phone with him.

name: Xquizet
text: As long as you speak with management you can get things resolved pretty quickly

name: Albert Turley
text: Went ther las week for safety glasses & they said they would order they ! Still not in ! !  - don't believe they did Order !

name: Mark H
text: This is a difficult company to work with.  They do not respond to the needs of their customers.  I am very disappointed with their customer service.

name: Ricky Montgomery
text: Great service.

name: William Wheat
text: Good stock of welding supplies, a little pricey and employees not very helpful

name: Marco Antonio Peregrina Sauce
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service

(Original)
Excelente servicio

name: Christopher Senn
text: After being treated like a thief at Wesco, I went to Airgas. They were very polite and helpful.  I was able to shop without being followed around. They are now my go to for supplies

name: Randy Wolf
text: Fast and friendly service. The guys at the city sales desk answered all my questions  professionally and in great detail that made me feel as if I was getting advice from a long time friend.

name: Barry Johnson
text: Super nice folks, great prices.  It is worth the drive to find these guys

name: William Leake
text: Prompt service, got me in and out in no time ,Thanks

name: Rick Maze
text: Good staff. Good selection. Price is high but they can work with you on it.

name: Scott Suttle
text: Knowledgeable staff.

name: Dennis Turnbaugh
text: Store great, employees werent to helpful! No prices on products and they made it seem like it was a Hassle to look a price up for me... So i didnt stay long and purchased my list elsewhere. Which was a $800 list. Other than that my experience was good!

name: William McPherson
text: Great employees that really help you out!! They have any gas that you need. Thanks

name: Mike Hump
text: Good store well stocked service a little slow

name: Mark Turner
text: The men behind the counter,answered the call,gave me the info I needed,and was there with the parts I was in search of!

name: Gorman Cassidy
text: Really helpful with product information and recommendations on different types of gases and uses, affordable and has nice equipment and accessories!

name: Kathleen Faulkner
text: Helped me get a 20lb c02 tank quickly!!

name: Samuel Tullis
text: Very Professional Staff

name: Timtimtimtim Timtimtim
text: GAS

name: james pendley
text: We're very friendly and helpful and everything I needed. Unlike the other welding store in the area that told me they just soon me find somewhere else to do business.

name: Alan Goodman
text: Half price for same stuff as big businesses, this is only place to shop for welding supply!

name: J316
text: Great place to buy refill C02 bottles for home brewing.

name: Jeremy Mize
text: A1 service

name: Artie Rose
text: Great service and great people, very knowledgeable about welding supplies and all types of gases.

name: Dan S
text: Very friendly and informative,  great customer service! I will definitely use them again. Thank you! Great place to get dry ice for anything you need!

name: Jarvius Walls
text: Just had an interview with Mr. Craig. Super cool dude. Whether I get the job or not, the experience was professional. Seems like a nice place to work.

name: Arthur Rose
text: Welding equipment and supplies, all types of compressed and Liquid gases

name: Thomas Hughes
text: Great company to deal with, excellent customer service.

name: Grace Dyal
text: Seems like the sales person was learning, but did good job. They had to order lens which was supposed to come to my house but he called and told me they were delivered to the store instead.  He was going to resend them them to my address, but I was going to be in Sylacauga the next day so I asked him to keep them and I would and did come by and get them.

name: Matt Dodgen
text: Price double between a phone quote and the time it took me to get there

name: Eric Cook
text: Just seemed a little high $134 to fill a tank of Argon??

name: Kim Kimbrough
text: Great people

name: Eric Dumas
text: Great service alot of hard to find ironworker tools and plenty of welding supplies

name: BOSS HOG Torque Converters
text: They were very helpful and listened to what I really needed.  I would suggest that you check them out. Welding is what we do.

name: Jack Horton
text: They have drove the price up as of late .will go to young welding next time.

name: Roger1967 Roger1967
text: Very helpful
